page.title: 11Education.
page.content: { { Littlewick Green.}The school has a total of 12 children 10 boys and 2 girls.There are 2 teachers including the head mistress. The sport they play is rounders & football.The times they go to school and come home are 8.45 am.to 2.45pm. {Redroofs.}Redroofs school educates 800 pupils and has 30-40 staff.The only sport they do is swimming and the times they go to and come home from school is 8.00 pam.to 3.00pm.Redroofs is mainly a theatre school.They do dancing and improvisations plus maths and English. {Woodlands Park.}The school has a total of 211 pupils and 8 full time teachers.The sports that they play are hockey,football,cricket,rounders, badminton and tennis.
